home.title: Daniel Heim
home.subtitle: Software Engineer Extraordinaire
home.desc: An experienced developer with a passion for crafting elegant solutions and engaging experiences.

about.title: Who I am
about.desc: I've been immersed in the world of software development since I was young, constantly sharpening my skills and adapting with the ever-changing industry. I'm hooked on the dynamic nature of this field and I love tackling the challenges that come with each new advancement. As a Senior Software Developer at Millipede, I have worked alongside some of the big shots in the Australian tech scene. It's given me invaluable insights into large-scale software development projects and the opportunity to contribute to cutting-edge solutions.

items.title: Games
items.desc: I have experience with game development, including Unity3D, C#, and JavaScript.

items.title: Mobile
items.desc: I have experience with both native (Android, iOS) and hybrid mobile (Xamarin, React Native) development.

items.title: Web
items.desc: I have experience with a wide range of web technologies, including the latest in HTML, CSS and JavaScript/Typescript.
